problem.markdown: 2.Which of the following is NOT TRUE about a multiplexer? (x) For a 2^n input MUX, there are n output lines ( ) MUX is a combinational circuit ( ) MUX can be implemented using three-state gates ( ) Apart from input and output lines, it has selection lines also
problem.p: 2.Which of the following is NOT TRUE about a multiplexer?

choicegroup.choice: For a 2^n input MUX, there are n output lines
MUX can be implemented using three-state gates
Apart from input and output lines, it has selection lines also
